import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import {data} from '../datas/data' import Header from '../components/Header' import '../assets/styles/Bien.scss' function Title() { const {id} = useParams() const bien = data.find((item)=>item.id===id) const host = bien.host console.log(host.picture) return (

{bien.title}

{bien.location}
{host.name}
{bien.tags[0]}
) } export default Title
